intro_only_event_multi_champion_battle_c:
I can tell from that look on your face that you’ve
done your homework... I’m impressed.

You know about the special Champion Stadium
happening right now, yeah?
Well, I’m the final opponent in it!

Those who manage to defeat four powerhouse
Trainers go on to battle the Champion...

Sounds an awful lot like how the Pokémon League
is structured in Unova and elsewhere, doesn’t it?

As a Gym Leader and Neo Champion of Pasio,
I aim to be a wall for you to overcome!

I’ll be waiting for you to challenge me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
